Top-3 Similar Questions: su_1132626: Changing home directory of user on Windows Subsystem for Linux
ul_267904: What is a good way to change a group of users UIDs without usermod executing a time consuming chown on the user home directory?
su_367215: Change location of root's home directory
Top-3 Scripts:
ul_267904: # mkdir -p /tmp/home/jsmith  ## uncomment if required.
homedir=$(getent passwd jsmith | awk -F: '{print $6}')
usermod -d /tmp/home/jsmith jsmith
usermod -u fixedUID jsmith -o
usermod -d "$homedir" jsmith
